definition: first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive

sentences.english: The number of corrupt officials fleeing China reflects the government's serious attitude about the crackdown on corruption.
sentences.chinese: 逃離中國的貪官數量反映了政府打擊貪腐的嚴正態度。

sentences.english: Lord Voldemort is preparing for battle and so must Harry.
sentences.chinese: 伏地魔和哈利都嚴正以待，準備戰鬥。

sentences.english: I feel very strongly you have to treat animals right.
sentences.chinese: 我很嚴正的認爲我們要善待動物。

sentences.english: We have made solemn representations to Belgium on this matter.
sentences.chinese: 我們已向比利時就達賴訪問進行了嚴正的交涉。

definition: to lose one's job/unemployment/not to fulfill one's obligations/to neglect one's job/dereliction of duty
to turn a blind eye to
to suppress/to crack down on/to prohibit
to ask sb to resign from a post
Mainland Affairs Council (Taiwan), abbr. for 大陸委員會|大陆委员会
Straits Exchange Foundation (SEF), semi-official organization established by the ROC government in Taiwan
to give a false picture of the situation
